FAVORITE AUTHOR: There are too many!

Albia PK Pre-Registration 2020-2021

The process is looking a little different this year with the COVID-19 Pandemic. If you have a student that will be 4 before September 15th they will be eligible for Preschool this upcoming 2020-2021 school year. Parents will be required to complete the regular fall registration process and turn in a copy of the child's birth certificate.

Student Scholarship Turn In Announcement 4/7/2020

Attention: AHS Seniors/Parents

Shayna Tallman added 3 new photos to the album: Scarlette Elyse 🎀 — with Kaytay A Ayy and 2 others.
December 23, 2019 at 9:55 AM ·

Some of you may remember when I posted about Beads of Courage before. It is a program for kiddos in the hospital with surgeries, cancer, etc. they get these gorgeous beads for sticks, surgeries, meds, treatments, etc. There’s a whole bunch of volunteers whom make beads, bags, etc.

Well, since I don’t know how to sew I had asked for someone to make bags on my behalf in honor of Scarlette to donate to the hospital for these kids. Mrs Katie Weaver took on the challenge and had her kiddos sew some in her class. Katie warned me they may not be perfect, however, I think they are. They have character. They’re homemade with love.

Thank you soooo much for taking on this project as an assignment for your kids; and thank you to your class for making these bags! 💕💕💕
